review_text: The house was amazing! Everything was clean and was certainly an enjoyable space for my family. Erin was very responsive and accommodating.

Pros: Erin was very responsive. Quickest response time I’ve had with any host. My son left an item there and she made sure we got it back. She truly went above and beyond for us. The house was so clean! Not one thing was even slightly dirty. It was quite impressive. The neighborhood was very nice and we felt very safe there. There was tons of space. The back yard was fenced in and it was so cute and peaceful out there. There were plenty of towels and supplies. The bathrooms were especially clean and had great water pressure and stayed hot through several of us showering back to back.
Cons: The AC wasn’t working, but she quickly contacted someone to come look at it. It wasn’t able to be fixed immediately but she offered to bring us fans and made sure our stay was discounted. As stated in the description, the house is old so the floors creak a lot upstairs. It didn’t bother most of us but I am a light sleeper so it was difficult to sleep for me while others were up. The street is busy.

This is a gorgeous old home in the heart of Marietta in a quiet neighborhood. You can walk almost anywhere in town from this location. Erin was a very responsive host who answered my emails in less than an hour (and usually sooner!) every time. We were there for a small family reunion and some stayed at Erin’s home while other’s stayed at the Lafayette. One of the things we really appreciated was that the kitchen was actually well stocked with silverware, plates, glasses, etc. We were able to order carry out the evening we arrived and not have to worry about having something to eat on and with! (There’s also a working dishwasher, which was very helpful.)
I highly recommend this home and this location.

We had a fabulous time at Erin’s player piano home. We felt as if we were right at home as soon as we arrived. Coming back to Ohio from the Carolinas we enjoyed the architecture and detail of the home. We thoroughly enjoyed the Pianola in the evenings once returning from a busy day! The beds offered a comfy and peaceful nights sleep. The home was quite peaceful for a town location. Being close to restaurants and shopping topped off the convenience of the location. Erin was a sweet breath of fresh air and we enjoyed our quickly answered communication with her. We will always book Erin’s player piano home every visit to Marietta!

We are so glad we chose to stay at Erin’s beautiful home whilst visiting from the UK for a family wedding in Marietta.
Erin was always responsive to our many questions and went above and beyond to ensure our trip was great from start to finish. The property was the perfect location in a quiet, stunning neighbourhood.
A great space for our group of 5 with everything we could have needed.
Thank you again for your incredible hospitality and we hope to visit again in the future.

Great place, great host! Highly recommend! Perfect place for our family to stay for Marietta College graduation weekend. A cool house with a big personality, everyone had fun picking which bedroom they wanted. Wish it didn't rain so much over the weekend, we didn't get to spend any time in the backyard or relaxing on the front porch. Thanks again to Erin for being a great host.
Beautiful home and area
Beautiful house in a great location!
This is a charming older house in a nice neighborhood with plenty of space. The area has plenty of restaurants and eclectic shops.
Full of character and style! Internet was very low (below 5 mbps at best) but fortunately wasn’t a necessary for our trip.

Excellent Airbnb. And who knew Marrietta was such a nice place to visit? The old downtown is super cool. The architecture everywhere nearby was so historic and interesting. We loved the Levee House Bistro and highly recommend the Scottish salmon, best salmon we have ever had. Back to the ABNB, it was so perfect for our party of three couples. No one had the any dissatisfaction. It really is a perfect place.

We arrived in Marietta during the flooding and weren’t sure about road closures or flooding near the home. We messaged Erin and she responded immediately that the house was not impacted and provided us alternate routes to get there. The instructions to get in the house were easy, and the house was spacious with plenty of room for me and my husband and his elderly parents. Plenty of linens. Nice fenced backyard. Very close to everything in Marietta.

Great location. Very lively and quaint neighborhood. The house is amazing. So many treasures around every corner. The upstairs master shower was wonderful. And the heater on there was such a great bonus. Very comfy and felt right at home!

This amazing house was better than the photos. It was perfect for our large group. Plenty of room, very very clean and comfortable. The shower in the bath upstairs was glorious! The location is convenient for restaurants and shops, felt very safe and parking out front was easy to find, even with 3 cars. Erin was very communicative and friendly. We can’t wait to come back again!
Very enjoyable stay. Comfortable home to stay in. Beautiful town and very walkable.

Hi Erin,
My crew and I had a nice stay.
Thank you
Rick D
Good value

Erin's home has a ton of character and is well loved. Her instructions for checking in were very clear and easy to follow. The home is so spacious and tastefully decorated. The restaurants are within a walkable distance as well as many points of interest such as the Mound Cemetery, Campus Martius, the Castle and various beautiful homes. My husband and I were thoroughly pleased and impressed with Erin's home and our stay in Marietta!
The description of the house is on point. Great Victorian home with all the charm.

Erin’s place was beautiful and is big had everything we needed, the only thing I can say on the down side is wish there was a bedroom downstairs my dad is 80 and it was hard for him to go upstairs and downstairs but besides that everything was wonderful and would stay again when I’m in the area.
Once again, a perfect place for my crew and I. Beautiful and comfortable house. I highly recommend staying here if you are in the area.

Erin was a great host and very responsive. The house was even better than the pictures. The descriptions of the house were very accurate. My family and I thought that our stay in a house that is that old, well maintained, and restored meticulously was a very cool experience. The decorations were awesome. We had everything we needed. We didn't want to leave.

Loved the house and the decor. In every nook and cranny, we would discover a new fun and quirky treasure. The house was stocked with everything needed for myself and daughters/friends for a girls trip. Thanks, Erin!

This victorian home was absolutely gorgeous. very spacious with lots of room for everyone.
Everything we wanted to do was in walking distance and the neighborhood was adorable. Definitely will stay again!
Everything was perfect in this lovely home in beautiful Marietta.
Beautiful home, perfect for visiting with friends in the area. We had an amazing experience and we would definitely stay here again!
Such a lovely house, with so much character. Perfect for a little Christmas break trip with our boys! Had everything we needed, and we just loved this house.

Erin's home was very clean, and just as you can see the decor in the picture that's what you will find when you arrive. so beautiful. it's a lovely Victorian home with lots of little findings thought the home to really almost put you back in that time period ! we loved it so much ! we were in for my sister's wedding and there were 8 of us, all getting ready at the same time there is plenty of space to do that. Erin, we thank you from the bottom of our hearts for being so kind and accommodating! we will definitely be back !
This was an awesome place to stay! The house is gorgeous with plenty of space for me and my crew. We will stay here again when we are in the area.
Erin’s Victorian house along a tree lined street was beautiful! Would definitely stay there again.

The airbnb was so lovely for my friends and I’s 1st get together after graduating college this past May. Walking inside gave an instant calmness and at home feel. It was spacious, cozy, and had detailed decorative charm! The kitchen was very useful for our meals and had everything we could have needed. We’d love to come back, already! 10/10 recommend.
It was perfect for our family.
incredible house and easy check in. highly recommend this location.
We had a wonderful time. Erin was quick to respond to any of our questions. Very cool home and beautiful!

FIVE STARS!
My family decided to meet in Marietta for vacation and we had a wonderful time staying at Erin's charming and spacious home! It was a very easy to find and we got settled in quickly.
It was very clean, comfortable, and inviting to stay there. The house was beautiful with intricate woodworking and details that made us feel like we went back in time. I love antiques and vintage and this house was full of great details. She did a fantastic job with her decorating. We had plenty of room and did not feel like we had to be quiet in order to not disrupt each other. The backyard was private and well fenced which was great for the dog to play in! It was nice to let her off leash safely.
The location was in a pleasant and quiet neighborhood and great for walking and exploring.
We have already discussed coming back next year to stay again!

Enjoy a stay in Historic Downtown Marietta :) I grew up here, this downtown area has always been the “place to be” and it’s within walking distance of many nice things to do/places to eat.
This house is beautiful, nicely laid out with lots of bedrooms and a nice backyard area. My girls loved how it was decorated and we felt very much at home during our stay! There is a park and library right nearby and the local grocery stores are close as well.
Erin was kind and responsive, we didn’t need anything while we were there, the house was very well appointed… but she was also available if we had needed.
If you’re staying at Erin’s make sure to stop into All Pro Nutrition and grab a shake/goodie! It’s one of our favorite spots in town :)
we visited Marietta for a wedding and used the house my parents, my wife and I and other family. it was convenient and centrally located and the house clean and spacious. it was a great weekend!
Lovely home with a nice mix of beautiful older architecture and updated amenities. highly recommend if you find yourself in the Mid-Ohio Valley.

Had a great time here! House and neighborhood was beautiful. Great exterior and porch with a really unique interior. It was beautiful. Pictures didn’t do it justice! Really special with a touch or creepy (the occasional doll in the house) but we loved it.

this place was beautiful, it is by far the best place I've stayed. very beautiful home, everything about this place was amazing, so much nicer than the pictures show. Erin's home was very nice and very clean, it's very easy to get comfortable here, it even has a home gym. The neighborhood is very nice and is walking distance from restaurants and shopping, you can be downtown in just a few minutes. Erin was always very kind and friendly, very accommodating and easy to talk with. I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely be back. a very good experience and I'm 100% satisfied. I can't believe that some people would pay just as much or even more to stay in a hotel, Erin's home is so spacious, you get a full home with a awesome fenced in back yard, all at a very reasonable price. all I can say is I loved it!!
if your ever in the Marietta area you should definitely check this place out.
thanks again Erin for sharing your beautiful home,,.... 😊
What an amazing host and person! Don't pass this property up! Beautiful location the house is AMAZING. If you are looking for a property that is close to everything and very quiet, this is it!

My preteen grandkids found plenty to do at the house..It was a charming setting. Erin was very responsive when we needed something or giving suggestions about what to do. She is very personable and we had several opportunities to spend time chatting.. I highly recommend this friendly getaway . It had plenty of space for the 7 of us. It was close to many delightful adventures in the town of Marietta. We love the town, and all the people we met. My grand children, as well as my daughter and myself enjoyed our stay.

We booked for the Sternwheel Festival and a fun adult away weekend. The house was walkable to the festival and had everything we needed for the weekend. Erin was helpful when we had questions about anything regarding the house. Neighbors were very nice and the neighbor was very safe and great for walking, lots of beautiful homes and churches. We had yo drive to restaurants but had a great experience every we went. The festival was a lot of fun and if go the fireworks show was the best we have ever seen. The house is older and much of the furnishing are as well but that added to the weekend for us.
Thanks erin! We had a great time!

Erin was a delightful host! Responded to all my questions in a timely manner and was very helpful! The house is gorgeous and perfect for our trip for our grandmothers 90th birthday! My sister, niece, nephew and partners/babies fit comfortably and the house had everything you could need! Great location, we won’t stay anywhere else in Marietta moving forward!
Erin’s place was a very quaint! She was very responsive with any questions we had and it was the perfect place for an overnight stay to view the town and surroundings as we were passing through.
unique, beautiful and interesting "story book doll house" with many fascinating furnishings

We had such a great stay at Erin’s. She was most helpful with detailed instructions on accessing our stay. I was concerned with the on street parking but it wasn’t an issue at all. It is an absolutely gorgeous place and we felt at home. It was perfect for our whole family to stay for a family wedding in the area. I’d love to return and just have a getaway here.

Great stay in Marietta! The house was charming and the hosts as welcoming as could be. Close to everything - we walked to the historic district and drove easily to surrounding areas. Easy parking, comfortable beds. Overall excellent visit.
Very close to everything in Marietta. Old cool house with beautiful woodwork throughout house. Comfortable and easy.

The Charmer was absolutely charming! The home was clean and inviting. The host did an amazing job of providing any forgotten essentials. We felt welcomed and relaxed. The area was perfectly located close enough to walk to visit different places but not too close. We will absolutely be back to stay.
Close to everything in Marietta. Very cute and clean. Our dogs loved the fenced in side yard.

I booked this home for my parents to stay at while visiting family in Marietta. My mother said it was extremely clean, comfortable, and conveniently located. She also wants to know what brand of matresses are in the befrooms, as both my parents slept so well in them. I will definitely book this location next time my family visits Marietta!

Emily is a very responsive host and the decor of the cottage was very welcoming. We appreciated the snacks and toiletries that were provided. Bedding was very comfortable and clean. The location was minutes from downtown with lots of restaurants/parks/shops. Overall, we were pleased with the accomodations and enjoyed exploring Marietta. Thank you, Emily, for being a great host!
Very cute space with everything you could need. Would definitely stay again

First of all, this place was stocked with care. Lots of linens, mountains of coffee pods, ample toilet paper and plentiful toiletries! While we didn't cook, I checked out the kitchen and had I wanted to prepare a full meal, all the needed pots and pans were there. We ate take out at the cute dining room table which seated four. There also are two very comfortable bar seats at the kitchen bar.
Second, this is a very dog friendly cottage. One of the porches has a gate up so guests can sit outside with their pup and there are no worries about their dog dashing off the porch in pursuit of a squirrel. There's also a fenced in yard, pet bowls & poop bags, and a crate that probably could house a medium sized dog comfortably.
We walked all around Harmar but enjoyed strolling along the river (which is less than 2 blocks away) the most. It's also easy to cross the bridge to walk around/dine in downtown Marietta!
The place was great and Emily was very responsive! We would definitely stay here again if we were in the area.

What an amazing place! Spacious, easy to find and central to everything.
Emily is a fabulous host. They thought of everything from snacks in the kitchen to thoughtful amenities in the bathroom.
Located on a quiet street with a beautiful porch. I would highly recommend this home.
This cottage was perfect for our quick stay. Wish we could have stayed longer!

We enjoyed our time in the Cherry Harmar Charmer! We felt welcome and at home inside and on the porches. My favorite part was that everything was actually clean. The furniture and beds were comfortable. Emily was great. We’ll definitely stay here again.
This was a perfect place for our weekend in Marietta! We will definitely look to book it again!!

Loved our stay at this charming and cozy little house! The house was perfectly clean and decorated very lovely. Amenities were great-had everything we needed to include snacks, coffee and toiletries. linens were soft and high quality, bed was comfy and we had a great stay overall. There were good restaurants a few blocks away that we walked to and downtown marietta is also a short walk and a very unique, charming town on the river. Emily was a great communicator, responsive, kind and thorough. Would definitely visit again. Thanks so much!
Home was nice and very clean. Description and pictures were accurate. Amenities as described and were very thoughtful. Host was very responsive and friendly. Will definitely stay again.
Great stay nice house to stay in!

Emily's fit the bill for 2 adults and 2 dogs. We were able to park our SUV+trailer along side the driveway, off the street. The fenced in backyard was just right for our 2 dogs to stretch their legs and do their business. The House was cute, clean, neat and tidy. We enjoyed sitting on covered back porch while dogs were out. Plenty of towels, blankets, pillows, toilettries, TP, Keurig coffes and creamers. We only stayed overnight so didn't use much or get out and about. We'd look into staying again when we're back in the area.
lovely place to stay! great for visiting Marietta
Such a nice, cozy place to stay. Felt perfectly like home and a beautiful home!
We really enjoyed our stay. Very cute place, and very clean. Will absolutely stay again!
It was a great stay for our 2 nights. It had great amenities and was exactly what we were needing. Would highly recommend this place!
Charming little house…decorated so cute. Cozy. Emily was very quick to respond. We had everything we needed and then some!!!

This place was PERFECT for our needs!!! We liked the separate bedrooms for privacy...SO much better then a hotel room ! The house was immaculate and the decor made it really feel like home. Although we didn't use them, we appreciated that in addition to the TV in the living room, each bedroom had their own TV, as well. The location was great with great shopping and restaurants nearby. The neighborhood was really quiet and we were able to sleep peacefully each night. The full size refrigerator really came in handy for ice and left-overs . We highly recommend it and will definitely stay here again when we visit Marietta!
I recommend this place. It was clean, easy to access, and affordable. I would definitely rent again.
Great place. Everything we needed.
The home was perfect for the 3 of us. If we are in the area again we will be a repeat customer!
Cute and welcoming little place. I only stayed a night but would definitely recommend. Special shout out to the bath towels which were straight out of a luxury hotel!

Emily is a very thoughtful host. Lots of extra touches to make your stay more comfortable. Very comfortable mattress which is very important when I am traveling for work. I will definitely be back every time I come to visit my client in Marietta. Thank you!
Lovely place to stay. Nicely cleaned and taken care of. Within walking distance to many things.
Emily was the perfect hostess and was extremely helpful as well as accommodating!
Great little space, very cute on the inside. Was perfect for our stay!
A great place to stay with a super responsive host.
A lovely cozy place! Hope to come back when its warmer.
I loved the location. Very close to restaurants in harmar, and just across the bridge from downtown Marietta. We stayed with our kids and it was great for them.

I booked this place for a few days because I needed some time to myself. It was perfect for what I needed. It is so cozy and the host thought about all the little things that are important when you have a guest in your home. I accidentally booked it for 1 day and Emily was quick to respond and get it fixed for me. I will book here again the next time I need a few days away from home.
Cute house and super dog (%human) friendly. Emily is very thoughtful!
Emily’s place was easy to get to and immaculate inside and out. It was a pleasure to stay here.
Our stay was wonderful! Very pet friendly, close to everything, literally cannot think of anything they did not have! Will definitely be staying here the next time we come into town!
Emily’s place is so clean and cute. We enjoyed our stay! We will definitely book here again!

This cute house was perfect for us. We really enjoyed all the extra touches. The location was really convenient to everything downtown. We come through Marietta a couple times a year and would love to stay here again.
We loved our stay! Very dog friendly!
Very nice place to stay. For people and pups . Thank you
Quaint older little cottage close to downtown Marietta. Comfortable and clean beds. Perfect for our one night stay!
Emily is a great host. Responded right away to any questions I had. Place was very clean and beds were very comfortable.
Emily’s place is very nice and clean. I absolutely loved the extra touches for pets. Emily responds right away. I would definitely recommend this stay to anyone.

Emily’s place was perfect for our one night stay in Marietta for a funeral. Very clean and comfy beds. Emily was super fast at responding! She was so kind and even let us check out late so our little one could nap.

Emily’s place was perfect for our quick weekend trip. Everything was very clean and well supplied. We also loved that our pet schnauzer was welcome and had a few amenities. Thank you for a great stay in Marietta.

Our stay was amazing! The home is beautifully decorated and I felt it was very clean! The only downfall was the basement door did not latch shut so could be a problem with little kids in the home. We used it for Christmas photos and they turned out beautiful. Definitely worth it!
Our stay was wonderful and very peaceful. Thank you very much Emily you did a great job on the house.
Home was clean and check in was super easy. Host was great with communication.
Great overnight stop on a road trip. Clean, comfy and convenient to the highway!

We felt right at home and appreciated all the extras that Emily had provided, including a supply of toiletries in case we forgot something, and treats (for people and pets!) in the kitchen. The beds were super comfortable. The house is located in an easily walkable location from downtown Marietta.
X

My stay at Emily's place couldn't have been any better. Everything was spotless and exactly as described. I REALLY loved the location and was able to get some exercise and run along the river from the BNB. Also, I would highly recommend walking up to The Anchorage Mansion right up the street. It's a historical home in Marietta and was really cool to walk around. Overall, 10 out of 10 stay!
Will stay at this location again!
Emily's place was clean, cozy, and comfortable. Home away from home. Perfect for our needs. Would highly recommend. Will be using again in the future. Thanks so much.
Emily was very responsive and helpful and even messaged me that we could check in a bit early. The home was really cute and comfortable.
Everything was very nice.
Loved the area and it was perfect for a weekend getaway 😊

We had an amazing time at Emily's. We were there with our kids and were able to enjoy cozy nights watching a movie and fun mornings making breakfast in the kitchen. The laundry was a huge gift for when the kids got muddy picking apples about 15 minutes away. The location meant we were about a 10 minute walk to the main strip of Marietta (or a 3 minute drive). Busy Bee was an awesome restaurant in walking distance. Just walking along the river was beautiful. We had a really wonderful time at Emily's and hope to come back next fall.
Emily was a very kind, clear communicator. Her place was clean, and though my husband and I were only there for the night, it seems to meet all your travel needs and then some.

We love the cute cottage! It was clean and very welcoming. The beds and linens were great quality and had plenty of bath towels and washcloths which is something important to me. We look forward to stay again soon!! Thank you, Emily for being a great Host!!
She is very nice person very helpful beds were very comfortable and would love to stay there again
Loved this little house. It had everything we needed and more and Emily was such a friendly and helpful host!
Great, cute, clean place! The extra little amenities were nice, thank you!
Well decorated and cute lil place! Host is responsive.
I enjoyed my stay at Emily's place. The house was larger than expected, cozy, and well maintained. I often travel to Ohio and would definitely stay again.

Had a great weekend. The space was very comfortable and Emily provided a lot of extra special touches. Took a nice walk along the river and up through the village of Harmar. Also took advantage of the great restaurants in the Harmar area.
We had a nice one night stay. Bed was comfortable. Worth the stay and better then a hotel room
Nice house for the price! Our family was in town for the Sternwheel Festival and it was within walking distance. Older home but updated nicely. I appreciate how clean it was.
Great stay felt right at home. The place was very welcoming from the time I walked through the front door

This place is a prototype of what the best of AirBnB can be, and the superiority that well managed entire homes on AirBnB can offer over hotel rooms. The house was beautiful, clean, and spacious, and the furniture and decor was very tastefully done, but also functional and very comfortable. Jennifer has planned out and provided almost anything you might think of, or possibly need, during your stay. This place was perfect for our family, and we would definitely stay here again if we needed to travel back to this area.
Great accommodations! Would highly recommend this place while visiting the Marietta area!

Rented for 7 people for our daughters wedding at The Barn at Willow Creek. The house was a lot larger than expected and there were plenty of places to go and have some quiet/alone time. The attention to detail in the design of the remodel is impeccable. Kitchen is absolutely my dream kitchen and we hosted our 7 plus the bridesmaids and groomsman and grandparents for a BBQ with no problem and everyone was amazed by the house.

Gorgeous old house beautifully renovated. I especially love that the linens and towels were so clean and not perfumey - my little girl and I have very allergy-prone skin, and prefer non scented detergents. This home was immaculate, and Jennifer was kind and helpful. Would absolutely recommend this gem!
Our family loved our stay over the Holidays. It was just like described and probably more beautiful in person. Loved the location, the decor, the KITCHEN was amazing. Not one thing to complain about.

The home was amazing, with beautiful antiques melding with new and comfortable sofas and chairs. Everything was well thought out from the extra USB ports on the lamps to the availability of tea and creamers for breakfast. The beds and pillows were great, with plenty of extra pillows, towels, etc. Jennifer was extremely responsive and very accommodating. My only note is the back steps and the powder room are a little narrow so may be difficult for senior citizens with mobility issues, but otherwise one of the nicest homes you can stay in and highly recommend.

Embedded in the memories we made will the the backdrop of this beautiful century house turned “old meets new” palace. The atmosphere was special for six of us sisters and cousins reconnecting as adults. Well supplied-we lacked nothing as we cooked meals or cozied up for conversation. The seating / milieu in the various rooms would work nicely for adults and or kids. Quality beds and linens aplenty. Luxurious bathrooms. More than just a place to stay- you want to move in.
First class all the way!
This is, by far, one of the most beautiful and well appointed places I’ve stayed. We didn’t have time to take advantage of all of the amenities and will certainly book again so we can!

Jennifer's house, "The Upperclassman" was the perfect place for our family to stay during our trip to Marietta. Impeccably clean! High quality finishes, stylish furnishings, and thoughtful touches throughout. While the home is historic, it has been completely renovated with all the modern conveniences (high end appliances, beautifully tiled showers, on trend high quality lighting and bathroom fixtures). The private fenced -in backyard was quiet and peaceful, a safe space for families of children of all ages. The location of the house makes walkability to the riverfront, shops, restaurants, and outdoor events (farmers market and outdoor live music ) a breeze. We absolutely loved our stay! We hung out in the upper game room quite a bit and found it cozy and comfortable. The TV's were easy to use as they already had basic cable AND were also smart TV's so we could log into our streaming apps as well. We can't wait to come back and stay at the Upperclassman again soon! Highly recommend!

This was a great location for us to meet our family 'halfway'. We had a lovely weekend packed with lots of family time --- this place was perfect for that! Great space/amenities that were just as described in the listing. Walkable to a playground and restaurants. A short drive to takeout places and coffee. A responsive & gracious host, we had zero issues. We will be back!
Absolutely exquisite! From the home to every little detail to make you feel at home! Perfect home! We plan to stay again!

Such an amazing home.
We will look to stay here every time we visit the area.
Clean, spacious, fun. Everything we could ask for….thanks Jennifer.

This house was enchanting! Every room was special; beautifully decorated and architecturally interesting. The master bedroom and bath was unique and gorgeous. The host took great care to make this house accommodating to every guest; children to adults. Traveling with young children, we especially appreciated the board games in the den and the attic game room. The house offered its own special discoveries for all. My three year old granddaughter especially loved "the secret library" of children's books. Our stay felt comfortable, heartwarming, with a little bit of magic!
We love our stay in this home. It was very clean, private, and spacious for me and my 7 bridesmaids. Would definitely stay again!

Austin’s air b&b is luxurious and welcoming. The house is beautiful and features modern upgrades in an historic setting. I particularly loved the movie room on the third floor and the spa-like shower in the primary bedroom en suite bathroom. Walkable to restaurants and several greenspaces, this place is a real gem. Would stay again any time.

Home was very clean and appeared like new inside. Pictures and descriptions are accurate. Liked the location in a residential area but walkable distance to the downtown with nice restaurants and shops. Would definitely rent it again when we’re back in town.
Wonderful updated home - great location - had a fantastic stay!! The beds were oh so comfortable!
We had a wonderful time at the Merydith House! It was beautiful, spacious, and super clean!

From the moment you walk in there front door, to the first time laying your head on the pillow, you know you are somewhere special. From the comfortable and welcoming parlor, the gourmet kitchen, the bedrooms, the bathrooms, the game room - no details has been overlooked in the remodel and preservation of this spectacular home. I look forward to staying here again!

Although the host was very friendly and flexible about our early check-in, we did have trouble getting inside. It turned out to be our mistake, not theirs! I just had never used a lock like they have. I assumed that once I punched the code in, I would just need to click the door handle. I think it would be helpful for others if they knew that they had to turn the key lock part first before trying to open the door using the thumb unlock to open the door.
Once we were able to get inside their beautiful home, our accommodations were perfect! We all absolutely loved and thoroughly enjoyed our accommodations at this gorgeous home! We are already planning a trip back to the area when the weather is warmer!
The house was absolutely beautiful! The heated bathroom floor in the master bathroom was a pleasant surprise! I will definitely stay here again the next time I am in town!

Austin’s home is a perfect example of an original marietta home that has been well cared for and then meticulously renovated, keeping the history and beauty of the home. Both my husband and I grew up in Marietta and this was a perfect space for our adult children to visit both sides of the family.
There was plenty of space for visiting cousins to share take out and then on the last day my mom came over and fixed a huge breakfast for the grandkids in the spectacular kitchen!
We will absolutely stay there again

We selected this house for a girls' weekend. it was beautifully appointed. Everything was great! we would love to return in the warmer weather to experience everything the town has to offer. It was elegant and cozy! The perfect place to stay.

Ours was a 5-star experience across the board. The house is beautiful, in a quiet area, and convenient to Marietta’s historic residential district and the terrific downtown. Communication with Austin was great. It was a perfect spot to spoil our children and grandchildren for the holidays! We would love to stay here again.
Nice house
Beautiful home, beyond expectations. Plenty of space for the whole family. Great location with plenty of off street parking. Walking path conveniently across the street.
The house was spectacular. So much room and just beautiful inside. Plenty of space for our family and spotlessly clean. We really enjoyed our stay.

The place is Gorgeous. The only recommendation would be to close off , the first floor shower that has a glass block window that faces outside. You can see into the shower/bathroom from the patio.

Austin was awesome, and the place was perfect. Plenty of space and great location - we will definitely be back!
The house is beautiful and newly remodeled. It’s in walking distance to downtown Marietta. This has been my favorite spot yet!

This location does not feel like a location set up for Airbnb profit. This location feels like it’s actually someone’s home they’ve generously decided to share with us. We had a beautiful stay! Austin was quick to respond and accommodating with our check in time. There was plenty of parking onsite, the home was clean, and well equipped for our group.

This is a must stay if you’re visiting Marietta! The house is absolutely beautiful and perfect for a group or family. It’s in the ideal location - Close to the river and darling downtown where you’ll find lots of shops and restaurants. Definitely recommend!

Lovely, spacious home with obvious care and attention to making the home comfortable and pleasant. Meticulously clean.
Comfortable outdoor area.
Beautiful home. Great, friendly host who got right back to us to answer questions. TYVM!
The house is a lovely old home with modern amenities. The primary bedroom has a nice shower with numerous shower heads. Beds are comfortable and the attic room is perfect for kids. Nice stay.
Very nice house for a stay in Marietta. The house is impeccably clean, kitchen is first class as are all the bathrooms. Would definitely stay again.
I can’t wait to stay there again! Stunning house!
The house was beautiful and easy to find. Very close to down town. We were in town for our sons wedding so didn’t get to take advantage of the local restaurants. Would definitely stay here again.
Lovely home and lovely stay ! Would stay here again - thank you !
highly recommend for a trip to marietta! the place was better than expected. very spacious, updated, clean. less than a 1 mile straight shot walk to downtown. would stay again!
Austin was super responsive and very helpful throughout. I highly recommend this place! It is absolutely beautiful and they have done a great job with the decor

WOW! This was LUXURIOUS! The gourmet kitchen was right out of HGTV! There is a water faucet above the stove to fill pots, and the giant refrigerator is built into the cabinets. A beautiful house with a great location. There is a walking trail across the street from the house that leads to downtown Marietta and has beautiful views of the river.
Austin was very responsive and accommodating to our needs! Clean, well stocked with amenities and in a quiet neighborhood.
Great spot for our golf weekend trip

Our family of 6 had a wonderful stay while in town to visit family at Easter. The home was extremely spacious. The decor and finishes were absolutely lovely and enhanced our stay. Our teens loved the loft area with the enormous television and the basketball hoop. The location was super convenient and we enjoyed visiting The museum nearby and the shops on Front Street.
We are staying there for work, great place and nice neighborhood!

The house is the beautiful restored Merydith House built in 1868. This home was in ruins before Austin bought the home restored it. Thank you for bringing new life to this old home. The home has everything you need plus luxuries like heated floors in the bathroom, gourmet kitchen and private parking on the property. The house was super clean and tidy. The home is very close to restaurants and shopping on front street. The river walk is just across the street for a nice stroll early morning or late afternoon and it is a 15 minute walk to Marietta College. And that’s a big plus for us when we come in town to see our son. Excellent home. Wonderful stay.

We had a wonderful stay at this home! Beautiful inside and out, spacious, and a great location close to the river and shops along Front Street. We are looking forward to staying here again the next time we're in Marietta. Thank you!

I stayed here with four other girls for the night before my wedding day and it was absolutely perfect! The host was very responsive and flexible with check-in time! As we walked through the house, we were all “ooh-ing and awe-ing” the entire time! The master shower is EPIC along with the heated flooring in the bathroom. The house was spotless and so cozy with some history and character. I will keep this beautiful home in mind when family come into town and need somewhere to stay.

Thank you, Austin for opening your home to us for our weekend away! The house is beautiful, top to bottom, inside and out. The upgrades to this historic home are impeccable. We will be back~
Pam
House is absolutely gorgeous- very well thought out! We had a wonderful stay!

This was a gorgeous home with top-notch appliances and elegant furnishings! It featured a gourmet kitchen for those who like to cook, a luxury bathroom attached to the master suite, the beginnings of a gorgeous library, and the makings of an epic movie theater/family space on the top floor! (As a brand new listing that has been recently remodeled, the owners are still putting finishing touches on a couple of rooms.) The location cannot be beat, with easy access to outdoor experiences, historical sites, and local shopping! For nature enthusiasts, there is a bike/walking trail that goes along the river (across the street), and an outdoor adult gym and arboretum are within walking distance. The Ohio Riverboat Museum across the street is also well-worth checking out! It provides an account of the rich history of Marietta and the makings of Ohio River towns. Local shops in Marietta's historic downtown are just a few minutes' drive down the street. What a fantastic find!
Hidden gym! Did not expect what we walked into. 10/10 would recommend

The place was excellent. Super clean and nice. Hosts were extremely friendly and welcoming. Place was super close to everything. The place was exactly what I was expecting

this place was amazing. I grew up in Marietta and was able to relax and enjoy the downtown. the shower was amazing and the hosts were more than amazing when I wasn't the greatest tenant.
I will definitely stay here again.

If the wind agrees we'll definetely be using the bikes in the shed to check out more of Marrietta! We’ve stayed here a few times when we visit family. Will stay again if it is available when we visit the area.
Thank you!!! I enjoyed everything

We enjoyed our stay. The apartment is conveniently located to everything downtown. Had it not been raining and snowing we could have easily walked to everything. Will definitely add this unit to our list of preferred places to stay when we visit Marietta.
We loved our stay here. It was a very nice place. Very clean and well maintained.
Great stay with great hosts. Marianella was there to meet us, make introductions & make sure the space was clean & ready. We would definitely recommend. Hopefully, we have a chance to come back!
Had an excellent stay and the apartment was fantastic ! I will always keep this location in mind when staying in Marietta and the host was incredibly welcoming. I have zero complaints about our stay.
Great loft and location.
Instructions were easy to follow. Location was exactly as described. It was perfect for our needs!

This was a perfect location for our visit to Marietta. Nearly everything was within a 15 minute walk of the loft. The loft itself was exactly what we were looking for. My wife and I came down to Marietta for the weekend and were looking for a comfortable place to stay, walking distance to restaurants, shops, and interesting things to see.

I am visiting Marietta OH for work and needed something that was nice and quiet, but close enough to amenities that I can step out for a cup of coffee or a beer. This place is just that. The space is very well kept and accommodating. I will definitely look to stay here when I come back for another round of work. Thanks.
Absolutely beautiful place very clean and modern in a great location. Everything was clear and simple.
Great place to stay.
Wonderful visit. thanks for being an amazing host

We had a wonderful stay at the loft! Very clean and decorated festively! We loved the comfy family room and updated kitchen and bathroom. And the location is perfect for dining and shopping in downtown Marietta.
Will be back!!!

I wish I could have spent more time in the unit, relaxing and enjoying the lovely space. Chip was very responsive to all of my inquiries and was a wonderful host! Will book again if I need acommodations.
Overall great experience. Some difficulty figuring out the heat/AC, and a minor issue with the steam shower, but otherwise very good. Would recommend and will return.
Fantastic loft in heart of the town walkable to everything highly recommend
Great space in which to relax. We look forward to staying there again when we are in the area.

Really cool place if you want to be in the middle of it all in downtown Marietta. Location is great, setup is awesome - all you need. Just beware the metal steps to climb up if you have any physical limitations.
Great space and location. This was our second time staying there. Chip and Marianella are great hosts.
Awesome location & stay!

Very nice clean place. Easy check-in and check-out. Really liked the location. Very walkable to all of the shops and restaurants in downtown Marietta.
Chip and Marianella were super responsive!!

Loved this flat! The enclosed shower was terrific, wish I could get one for our home. The kitchen was new and modern. Chip and Marianella have put a lot of thought into this place. This was a cool, hip, roomy and comfortable apartment directly opposite of the Ohio River. I used the rail trail for walking, biking and running. I could walk to get coffee and dinner. Fun to check out the earthen mounds and good proximity to Blennerhassett Island.

Wonderful, peaceful place to come home to after long days doing touristy and family things. Expectations for sharing their space were resonable and clearly expressed and easy with which to comply. We look forward to staying here again when we come back to the area. Thank you Chip and Marianella for providing such great space for us to hang our hats for a few days.

We enjoyed our visit to Marietta, The Loft is close to the river, bike trails and cute little shops ! If we are in the area again we will definitely check to see if theLoft is available. Thank you, Chip&Marianella
Such a cute space. Great hosts. wonderful location by a walking/bike path. and the shower🙌🙌🙌 I can't wait for my next trip.

Was a very nice and relaxing place. Home was welcoming, clean and comfortable. Host was friendly and helpful with many food and activity suggestions. 1st Airbnb experience and these “super hosts” had a wonderful place in a town we love to visit. Will not hesitate to use again. So much in walking distance of the loft.

Great central location! The shower is quite an experience! Lots to in this cute river town! If there first of month, check out First Friday downtown! Moose Club nextdoor can be a little loud on weekend.

Well-appointed loft, close to walking path along the river. Sylish, comfortable and clean. Our host, Chip, was personable and friendly. Location is great for access, not the view necessarily. Very helpful hosts! With all walking distance to the Ohio River & Marietta College.

We absolutely love this loft!! It is close to downtown shops and dining!! The host is very welcoming and checked in with us during our stay to make sure everything was okay. Would highly recommend staying here!!
We had a amazing trip back to Marietta. Our accommodations , right in the heart of town was a big part of it. Loved it ! Great Hosts !!

Marianella!
We stay here when we visit Marietta. Love the area and this Airbnb.

The town is easily walkable and close by and the Kroger store within a couple of miles.

Lovely place to stay. Would stay again. :)

Nice comfortable place. Walking distance to downtown restaurants and pubs.
We enjoyed our stay .. everything was comfortable , and ,We loved the location .Chip was pleasant and communicate with us to insure our visit was enjoyable.I will definitely go back.. Thank you😊
Great comfy space! Saturday morning walk to farmers market minutes away was bonus; hot breakfast sandwiches and much more. Will definitely consider a return stay next time we are in the area.

Chip & Marianella’s place was so peaceful and serene. It is decorated so beautifully. It is perfect, we didn’t get to see everything we wanted to so we will definitely be back.

This is my second time staying at this residence and I would stay there every time I’m in the area if it was available. Great apartment. Well furnished. Accommodating hosts.

Awesome place. Comfortable and stylish. Slept well and enjoyed the short walk to many local vendors.

Great host and very accommodating. Nicely appointed space and very convenient to all of our favorite spots in Marietta. Would definitely stay again.

This is a great place to stay! The loft has great ambiance. There is a lot of life going on in the area.
Awesome updated accommodations with everything available inside and the town outside. Host and hostess had great communication and available for anything which may arise.

Awesome loft, great location! Everything was great!!! Will be back! Thank you! Becki

This is an upscale loft in an interesting college town with many amenities. The residence is in the heart of Marietta, close by restaurants, bars and Marietta College. It is full of remote controls and details which will delight its occupants. Lovely place to stay, highly recommended.

Beautiful loft! excellent location! immaculate as advertised and much more! Spa shower, quality appliances. So very well appointed in all areas! We will stay here again whenever we have the opportunity to visit the area again. Just terrific!!
Truly wonderful. Great space in a great location
This is our second time at Chip's and it was just a pleasant as the first. This is our go-to spot in Marietta.

Awesome place great host the unit was awesome and it was downtown close to everything
Awesome location! Great modern place!

Terrific place. High end finishes. They're remotes have remotes. :-) Great location, terrific entertainment center, fanciest shower i've ever been in, luxurious towels. It would be a great place for an extended stay. Definitely would come back.
Once again, we had a wonderful stay! The loft is clean, close to everything, amazing shower, and great, communicative hosts. We will be back!

Great place to stay! A true hidden gem. Although the alley way was confusing, once there, the inside was not only comfortable but also stylish. Would have loved to stay even longer

Everything everyone else said is true! We were there during heat advisory weather and the fancy air conditioner was a blessing. Plus it made a nice white noise sound.
